item.title: By: kenrick
item.dc:creator: kenrick
item.description: No kidding about the 'custom api' thing. I got that notification by email and all I could think was 'wow this guy is doing this the hard way'... But talking about IXR, its a great library and all, but I really had some problems getting the introspection server working correctly. Oh well, still is a nice drop in solution.
item.content:encoded:
No kidding about the ‘custom api’ thing. I got that notification by email and all I could think was ‘wow this guy is doing this the hard way’…
But talking about IXR, its a great library and all, but I really had some problems getting the introspection server working correctly. Oh well, still is a nice drop in solution.
